website_summaries.verdict: As a single-ingredient lentil pasta, you get a product that is also high in fiber and protein.
pros: So many good choices with this product
No soy, eggs, or extra ingredients
Includes 10 g of fiber and 25 g of protein in every serving
Serves up like regular pasta, but it is much better for your overall health
cons: Lentils are a legume, which is in the same family as peanuts
Has a higher cost than many

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely horrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I read a review (5 star ???) on here that stated it tasted better than wheat pasta...I should have known. Wheat pasta tastes like cardboard and this tastes like a mushy wet paper towel. I followed directions to a T and failure of epic proportions! Broke into pieces....cooked it again, but shorter time, tastes horrible and turned to mush in my mouth. Sadly had to purchase 5 pounds so I am going to be tossing the rest. There is better gluten free pasta out there for sure. Don't waste your money on this garbage! Also package came opened with loose pasta in bottom of box, customer service NEVER even responded to me complaint
customer_reviews.author: jetlu

customer_reviews.title: good wheat pasta alternative
customer_reviews.text: We use both this and the Bentilia red lentil pasta and both are great wheat substitutes. I find the black bean has a little more flavor than the lentil which requires a bit of salt and/or herbs and sauce or olive oil. Both go well with different sauces and have the heft of old-fashioned pasta, but without the negative side effects some of us experience from wheat. We appreciate Bentilia producing the large 5 and 10 lb bags which are much more economical.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst Lentil pasta I have ever had. It's gross to be perfectly honest. It's doesn't stay firm it gets mushy no matter how long or short a period of time you cook it. I really feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey G.

customer_reviews.title: OMG is this stuff great !
customer_reviews.text: This pasta is amazing ! The texture is as good as wheat pasta. I think i like it better than wheat pasta and i'm Italian. I went vegan a few months ago and needed a different source of fibre and protein. This fits the bill. I know that a 5# box may be a little to much for some , so buy a single box and try it. You will not be disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and Protein-Packed
customer_reviews.text: I keep a box of this at the house at all times. It's part of my weekly menus, it's nice, I'll measure out 100g of this pasta (dry) which has 25g of protein, and is a nice supplement to my meals. It *is* high in carbs, but not nearly as high as you'd expect for pasta, and it has the benefit of being high in fiber too. The texture isn't 100% the same as pasta, but is still good and I don't mind it at all.
customer_reviews.author: ASDF

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BUY
customer_reviews.text: The picture and description talks about a box. When I received the product it was in a plastic bag with a few loose noodles. Terrible and I would never recommend! I never would of bought the product if it was properly advertised
customer_reviews.author: J Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Great Substitute for Flour Pasta!
customer_reviews.text: Love this penne! It's great substitute for pasta dishes. I like it better than the black bean penne because the lentil penne does not lose it's consistency and is not gritty. It can be cooked al dente.
customer_reviews.author: Happily Natural

customer_reviews.title: Splits into tiny pieces when over cooked
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to serve it to my baby soft. The pasta split into many tiny pieces. I purchased another brand that held very well to being overcooked and baby loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Bella N

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: These noodles are amazing! I have been gluten free for 3 years and it was incredible to be able to have this type of pasta again! Even my husband who loves wheat, loves this pasta too! He feels like they're just as good as original pasta. They are a hit with my kids too! And I love that they're full of nutrition! I highly recommend them to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Cherylyn Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: It’s gluten free and so flavorful
customer_reviews.text: People!! This is THE BEST pasta I have ever ever had! I am not a pasta person, but this is absolutely amazing! I don’t know how they make it but I am amazed! I put some avocado oil, some Tones Italian spagetti seasoning blend mix on it, and some salt, and I am good! Let me just eat the whole pot by myself! I am now officially a lentil pasta lover! I’m ordering another box right now! Unbelievable good all on its own. Ashley
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: It has great flavor and texture
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter can't eat regular pasta. She loves this! It has great flavor and texture. I would recommend rinsing it in cool water when you're done cooking to help with some of the sticking as it definitely sticks more than regular pasta seems to.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly & Allan

customer_reviews.title: Good but a lot of the bag is broken in shipment
customer_reviews.text: Good but a lot of the bag is broken in shipment and it becomes mushy soup when cooking
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaDreaming

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Repeat buyer many times. Keep making this healthy style of pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Carol60532

customer_reviews.title: Best pasta alternative
customer_reviews.text: Nutritious and full of flavor... With or without a sauce. As a physician, I recommend this product to all of my patients. Anti-inflammatory, low glycemic, full of fiber and protein.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C. Dellechiaie

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I did not check the test of pasta yet. But the packaging is not hygienic and big turn off for me. It arrived in dusty clear cheap plastic bag, without any label. It was very dusty and not sealed but tied with string on top. Wonder if this product is hygienic and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: So tasty for being just red lentils
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be delicious! The only ingredient is lentils and somehow the pasta is so flavorful. We ordered the 5 lb bulk option thinking it would cut down on packaging and waste but we got like ten or so individual packages, which was disappointing. Otherwise, great purchase. I would totally get these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: edible
customer_reviews.text: Not overly tasty but if you can't eat too much wheat, and ok substitute. Does not reheat well.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Native

customer_reviews.title: as good as others are saying
customer_reviews.text: yes, as good as others are saying. has worked well with all my pasta sauces. best gluten free pasta i have tried so far. the packaging is weird, so i keep it in a cereal plastic container i got from the container store.
customer_reviews.author: anativitateml

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this pasta!
customer_reviews.text: Love using the red lentil pasta to replace my whole wheat pasta. I don't eat meat so having the higher protein content is a definite plus. I feel fuller longer. I do need to learn more recipes though!
customer_reviews.author: harpeb

customer_reviews.title: Nutritious and filling
customer_reviews.text: Very healthy meal and filling. One does not go hungry after having a bit of this. Easy to cook and very nutritious.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t taste good at all !!!
customer_reviews.text: The taste wasn’t appealing at all , sorta chalky and mushy even though it was cooked to “al dente “ , what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Taste great, but it cost a fortune
customer_reviews.text: The taste of the noodle was great, but it cost a lot of money. It is outrageously expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kerense Harryman

customer_reviews.title: Great Food and Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased product many times. Positive feedback all the time
customer_reviews.author: Terry Stone

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pasta
customer_reviews.text: Great pasta! I have been looking for a good lentil pasta and am very happy with this brand. I love that it is 100%lentil and I can't tell a difference between this and the more expensive brand tolerant.
customer_reviews.author: BLynnLin

customer_reviews.title: It's a good lentil pasta
customer_reviews.text: It's a good lentil pasta. Cooks up nicely and holds together. It's a nice way to make an easy, high protein meal that kids like. The price is much better than the per ounce price of smaller packages from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: VIVIAN BALLARD

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste. Requires a bit longer cooking time. Rinse after cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Living in the Bubble

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality organic red lentil pasta for those of us who are gluten free. Has a taste and texture similar to traditional pasta. Be advised: This pasta will cause the water to foam up and boil over during the cooking process if you don't watch it. This is common with all lentil pastas.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S

customer_reviews.title: A staple in our diet
customer_reviews.text: Best starch free / grain free pasta we've had and is a staple in our families diet.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoGirl

customer_reviews.title: All Around Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: You and your products, are Awesome! I highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent texture
customer_reviews.text: Excellent when cooked the appropriate amount of time. Overcooked the texture isn’t the best, and the noodle falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super pasta
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic food for the health conscious. Being high in fiber and protein make it awesome workout fuel. Eating pasta is now good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Devilbiss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. However, i did get acid reflux the first day or two of use. Weird!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited about this but the plastic bag ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this but the plastic bag the pasta was in was opened and the pasta was everywhere in the box :/
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this exclusively for everything other than cheese dishes. No need to boil the pasta. Just add the weight of the pasta in water or other liquid such as broth. That way you do not lose nutritional value to the water. The bulk size is nice. We just add 2 ounces of pasta for each person to the dish plus the appropriate amount of meat and sauce...quick and easy. The taste is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Skylark PoemsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great pasta!
customer_reviews.text: We really did enjoy this pasta. Still working on cooking time, but rally like it
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this pasta!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this every 3 months. It's a mainstay in our house. My 20-something picky daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: The instructions tell you to cook it 8-10 minutes, i have been cooking it for 15-20. Tastes great with pesto and marinara
customer_reviews.author: Goozoo

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is really not good at all. I threw the whole thing in the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gummy and Expensive
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely adore the chickpea pasta I bought from Amazon. I thought we'd try this red lentil pasta. I finally got around to cooking some. I found the pasta to be gummy when cooked, and quite flavorless. This was extremely expensive for the quality, and not something I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Best value and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Best value and tastes great!!! The texture is just like regular pasta, but with so many more benefits -- low glycemic, high fiber, high protein. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mergatroy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pasta! Lots of protein so I don't feel guilty eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Fantastic substitute for wheat pasta. Wish it were less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Could eat this every day
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!!! I just wish they would include nutritional info but you can look it up online.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome taste, texture.  No processed carbs!
customer_reviews.text: This pasta tastes great in red sauce, baked mac n cheese, tuna casserole and even holds up well in soup. A real winner! Price is good, too, considering the high quality and bulk package. I will definitely be ordering it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rockstockandroll

customer_reviews.title: It's better than pasta...
customer_reviews.text: Well it tastes as good if not better than regular pasta. Its better for you and wheat pasta tastes like card board.
customer_reviews.author: Francis C. Markham

customer_reviews.title: We love this pasta
customer_reviews.text: We love this pasta! We’ve tried several lentil pastas and this one cooks the fastest, and to the texture we prefer!
customer_reviews.author: Karis Madden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for gluten or grain free diets
customer_reviews.text: Excellent option for those on a gluten free or grain free diet. Exceptional source of fiber. My spouse now prefers it to grain based noodles as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, best lentil pasta I have tried to date!!
customer_reviews.author: anthony licata

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing taste. Healthy and easy to cook. Will buy again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like regular pasta but is so much better for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Stan Main

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan. Was gassy after wards each time ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. Was gassy after wards each time trying them. I have tried two different ways of cooking because there is no directions on the package. And yea it’s one big bag in a box so have a way to store them if your going to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Tolerant Foods!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had been buying Tolerant Foods red lentil penne and thought we'd try this one because it's much cheaper. We found it to be nearly as good as Tolerant Foods (maybe just as good, actually...it is close!).
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: The pasta drained easily with almost no sticking
customer_reviews.text: I took some advice from other reviews and really made sure not to overcook the pasta, I would say I very slightly undercooked it, turned the heat off and waited 1-2 minutes before draining. The pasta drained easily with almost no sticking. It was perfectly, al dente. My family really enjoyed it, including the picky eaters.
customer_reviews.author: Misty zipprich

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: SUPER carb filled. Be sure to check the label. This thing has a lot of carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Blue

product_meta.title: Bentilia Red Lentil Penne Pasta- Natural, Low Glycemic Index, High Protein Fiber, Non-GMO, Gluten Free Pasta - 3 Pound Bulk Case
feature_bullets: ✔ 42% DIETARY FIBER: Contains prebiotic fiber which supports and promotes healthy digestion.
✔ COMPLETELY ALLERGEN FREE: Certified gluten free, no soy, no eggs. Kosher food!
✔ GOOD CARB, LOW-GLYCEMIC INDEX FOOD: With its low Gl (21) Bentilia Pasta allows you to apply your diet and lose weight without depriving yourself of your favorite pasta.
✔ KID FRIENDLY: Invisible vegetable source, naturally high in iron, folate, and 25% pure natural plant protein.
✔ QUICK & EASY: Perfect for any pasta recipe, great in cold salads or soups. Easy to cook and prepare.
